alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tishomingo, Prentiss and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thrashers, or 7 miles east of Booneville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Midway, Wheeler, Leedy, Rienzi, Paden, Oldham, Blythe Crossing, Gaston, Carter Branch and Hazard Switch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
